definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now
a moment ago/just now/(indicating sth happening later than expected)/(preceded by a clause of condition or reason) not until/(followed by a numerical clause) only

sentences.english: Zhao Zilong reported to you that Jingzhou is facing danger, you wanna go back, so you came up with this idea.
sentences.chinese: 方才赵子龙报说荆州危急，你欲还乡，故推此意。

sentences.english: You talked about the future of China-Malaysia relationship in your questions. I agree with you that mutual trust comes first and foremost in China-Malaysia relations.
sentences.chinese: 方才你提到中马关系的未来，我也以为首先是互信。

sentences.english: But Solomon was building his own house thirteen years, and he finished all his house.
sentences.chinese: 所罗门为自己建造宫室，十三年方才造成。

sentences.english: In foil and saber, only the attacking fencer can score a point.
sentences.chinese: 在花剑和佩剑比赛中，只有进攻方才能得分。

sentences.english: My clothes are all wet. Ive been working in the rain.
sentences.chinese: 我的衣服全湿了，我方才不断在雨中干活。

sentences.english: The music you played was so loud that the house is seemed to shake.
sentences.chinese: 你方才把音乐放得响到整个房子都震动了。

sentences.english: It took Solomon thirteen years, however, to complete the construction of his palace.
sentences.chinese: 所罗门为自己建造宫室，十三年方才造成。

sentences.english: A stripling lad when I left home, an old man I return.
sentences.chinese: 我从小离开了家乡，到了年纪老大的时候方才回来。

sentences.english: There is only the swing creaking, that you have just left.
sentences.chinese: 你方才拜别，只有秋千吱嘎作响。

sentences.english: I have just received the Royal Society King Charles II Medal.
sentences.chinese: 方才，英国皇家学会授予我“查理二世国王奖”。

sentences.english: Is uncle Huang's fair still disliking front yard son those women loud.
sentences.chinese: 皇叔方才还嫌前院儿那些女人吵呢。

sentences.english: It was a wake-up call for Milan who began to take the game seriously and utilise all their assets.
sentences.chinese: 米兰方才如梦初醒，认真对待比赛，使出浑身解数。

sentences.english: D one Kang takes back a thigh, another area just what to use is accurate overlord's leg to split.
sentences.chinese: 丁一康收回腿，他方才使用的正是霸王腿劈。

sentences.english: I went to his place just now.
I just had a super-duper meal in the resturant.
sentences.chinese: 我方才正在餐厅吃了一顿超等大餐。

sentences.english: Cassio. Why, this is a more exquisite song than the other.
sentences.chinese: 凯西奥呃，这支歌比方才唱的那一支更好听了。

definition: half of the day/a long time/quite a while
half the day/a long time/quite a while
to be just about to/to be on the point of
